title: Brutal Night Siege Battle: Austrian Rebellion - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Mod Gameplay
description:
The Holy Roman Empire is at war!  One of their vassals has gone rouge, the Duchy of Austria is fighting for their independence.  Austria stands no chance against the Holy Roman Empire and her allies.  So they look for aid in the east! Poland and Lithuania are more than happy to fight for Austria's independence, and make the Holy Roman Empire weaker!  Enjoy the Siege Battle :D

Medieval Kingdoms is a Mod for Total War Attila
Mod Link: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=770918746

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
